record.description: Edwin A. Locke Jr., president of the Union Tank Car Company, was named chairman of the Citizen's Committee. [The group will] help raise funds for the University of Chicago's $32, 700,000 campaign to strengthen teaching and research, and to [extend] student housing and scholarships over the next ten years
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate bio enclosed, not used for caption. Attached caption and separate caption id's picture. Photographer and Press stamps.
